# 1. Linear transformations of two random variables 
  
$$E(X \pm Y) = E(X) \pm E(Y)$$

$$Var(X \pm Y) = Var(X) + Var(Y) \pm 2Cov(X,Y)$$ 

If $X$ and $Y$ are independent random variables, then $Cov(X,Y)=0$.
